attributes.review: i was so excited to get this app but when it finally downloaded i started getting pimples on my face and rashes all around my body. my eyes started stinging and my hair fell off. i was terrified, and then i deleted the app. when i finally deleted it, everything went back to normal. this app cannot be allowed to exist!! wait till my father hears about this!
attributes.title: horrible app
